newsitem.title: USA: OneLink president, CEO Blum resigns.
newsitem.headline: OneLink president, CEO Blum resigns.

text.p: OneLink Communications Inc, a communications technology company, said Thursday Nick Blum has resigned as president and chief executive officer.

Acting chief operating officer Scott Sundet will assume the presidency on an interim basis until the board completes its search for a president/chief executive, the company said, adding that Sundet is a candidate for the permanent job.
OneLink said Bluhm, who was brought in in May of 1996 to turn the company around, will remain a director.
After implementing a new strategy, Bluhm has chosen to focus on developing other telecommunications opportunities while assisting OneLink on following through with the new vision, the company said.
OneLink shares were unchanged at 1-7/16 Thursday.
